snippet.title: Selfish Cupid - BL (Boys Love) Visual Novel
snippet.description:
Ten (Renamable MC) has the ability to see other people's soulmates after he was chosen to be the cupid's vessel. He is tasked to help bring couples together. But there is just one problem... Ten couldn't care less about other people's relationships. He only cares about his own love life.

One day, Ten finds out that his crush and rival are soulmates who are meant to be! What will he do? Be jealous or bring them together? Being the cupid's vessel, Ten can change the outcome of people's relationships. In order to pursue a love interest and date them, he must first prevent them from ending up with their soulmates. So what will he do?

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2449900/Selfish_Cupid__BL_Boys_Love_Visual_Novel/?curator_clanid=4777282

#boyslove #bl #yaoi #boy #anime #animeboy
